content: this legal document explains the progress of a cause involving the ownership and distribution of two apartments in castelfidardo italy the first apartment has been divided between two parties with one retaining bare ownership and the other retaining usufruct the second apartment is fully owned by another party the document also mentions the cadastral income and value of each share the parties have settled any outstanding balances and issued a receipt for payment the document also includes information about the legal requirements and regulations related to the building in summary the document outlines the division of ownership and settlement of financial matters between the parties involved
